short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A small chrome plugin that let's you easily clip things to Obsidian

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an unofficial clipper for Obsidian that allows you to easily clip a selection to a note in Obsidian. Clip a selection in Chrome with or without markdown support to Obsidian.
